calculations.name: Status Category
calculations.tableau_expression:
IF [Status] = "Present" THEN "On Time"
ELSEIF [Status] = "Work From Home" THEN "Remote"
ELSE "Needs Attention"
END

calculation_context.Expression:
IF [Status] = "Present" THEN "On Time"
ELSEIF [Status] = "Work From Home" THEN "Remote"
ELSE "Needs Attention"
END
